description:
I love how versitile this program is and how I can create sets of folders and send them EXACTLY where I want to without needing to copy the entire drive. In that regard "fwbackups" is exactly what I am after¬

I wish this had SAMBA support to communicate to my NAS/File Server, and that remote sources support incremental backups as the total size for all my folders I want to backup is LITERALLY terabytes! The fact that I have to copy an entire set for 1 or 2 file changes is brutal for the sizes of folders I am dealing with from my work.
summary: Good Idea in Theory, But Missing Features I Need

description: It's back! Now plays nice with Python 3.
summary: The only backup program you will ever need
